submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse = True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse = True)

        hi, vi = 0, 0
        hs, vs = 1, 1
        res = 0
        while hi < m-1  and vi < n-1:
            if horizontalCut[hi] >= verticalCut[vi]:
                res += horizontalCut[hi] * vs
                hi += 1
                hs += 1
            else:
                res += verticalCut[vi] * hs
                vi += 1
                vs += 1

        while hi < m-1:
            res += horizontalCut[hi] * vs
            hi += 1
            hs += 1 
        while vi < n-1:
            res += verticalCut[vi] * hs
            vi += 1
            vs += 1
        return res
